description:
🏃 RUN – Final Trailer (2025) | Alien Invasion Movies in 4K 👽
You can hide… but you can’t escape. RUN is the nerve-shredding new alien invasion thriller of 2025 — a fight for survival where every step could be your last. 

🌌 Film Overview:
What was meant to be a carefree escape turns into a nightmare when a group of friends stumble into a small town under siege. As strange lights fill the sky and mutilated bodies appear in the woods, they realize something horrifying: the invasion has begun, and they’re trapped on the front lines.

Now, survival means sticking together — but when the enemy can control minds, even friends can’t be trusted.

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
